features.name: Deft Strike
features.desc: An swordlord can add his {g|Encyclopedia:Dexterity}Dexterity{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} (if any) to {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage rolls{/g} made with a dueling sword instead of his {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g} bonus. This bonus on damage {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}rolls{/g} applies whether the swordlord is wielding a dueling sword {g|Encyclopedia:Light_Weapon}one-handed{/g} or two-handed. An swordlord cannot use this ability if he is wielding a shield or using an off-hand weapon (including armor spikes, {g|Encyclopedia:UnarmedAttack}unarmed{/g} strikes, or {g|Encyclopedia:NaturalAttack}natural weapons{/g}).

features.name: Display Weapon Prowess
features.desc: At 2nd level, an Aldori swordlord adds a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} equal to half his {g|Encyclopedia:Class_Level}class level{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Persuasion}Persuasion{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill checks{/g} made to intimidate. He also gains an additional +1 bonus on Persuasion skill {g|Encyclopedia:Check}checks{/g} made to intimidate while using Dazzling Display with a dueling sword for each of the following {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feats{/g} he has with the dueling sword: Greater Weapon Focus, Greater Weapon Specialization, Improved {g|Encyclopedia:Critical}Critical{/g}, Weapon Focus, or Weapon Specialization.

features.name: Defensive Parry
features.desc: At 3rd level, an Aldori swordlord gains a +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to his {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g} against {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttack}melee attacks{/g} when making a full {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} with a dueling sword. This AC bonus increases to +2 at 7th level. If an Aldori swordlord is also a fighter with the Aldori defender fighter archetype, levels in this class stack with his fighter levels when determining the AC bonus from this ability.

features.name: Adaptive Tactics
features.desc:
At 4th level, an Aldori swordlord learns to adapt his fighting style to counter his enemy's strengths. An Aldori swordlord reduces the {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack roll{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} for fighting defensively or using Combat Expertise by 1 at 4th level and by 2 at 8th level.
In addition, after a creature attacks an Aldori swordlord for the first time, he attempts a {g|Encyclopedia:Perception}Perception check{/g} ({g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} = 10 + the opponent's {g|Encyclopedia:BAB}base attack bonus{/g}). If successful, the Aldori swordlord gains a +2 circumstance {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on attack {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}rolls{/g} and to his {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g} against that creature until the end of combat.

features.name: Shatter Confidence
features.desc: At 5th level, an Aldori swordlord attempts a {g|Encyclopedia:Persuasion}Persuasion{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill check{/g} to intimidate and demoralize his target as a {g|Encyclopedia:Free_Action}free action{/g} after he confirms a {g|Encyclopedia:Critical}critical hit{/g} or succeeds at a disarm, or sunder {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Maneuvers}combat maneuver{/g} with a dueling sword. If his target is already shaken, the Aldori swordlord can once per {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} attempt a Persuasion {g|Encyclopedia:Check}check{/g} to Intimidate and demoralize the target further after any successful {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttack}melee attack{/g} or combat maneuver. If he succeeds at this check, the target suffers an additional -1 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack rolls{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g}, and loses all morale {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} to these checks.

features.name: Saving Slash
features.desc: At 6th level, when wielding a dueling sword, an Aldori swordlord can try deflecting a {g|Encyclopedia:Critical}critical hit{/g} targeting him, reducing its {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} to that of a normal hit, with a 25% chance of success. This does not stack with the fortification {g|Encyclopedia:Special_Abilities}special ability{/g} of magical armor or similar effects.

features.name: Dexterous Duelist
features.desc: At 7th level, an Aldori swordlord does not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:Attack_Of_Opportunity}attacks of opportunity{/g} when standing up from prone.

features.name: Greater Saving Slash
features.desc: At 9th level, an Aldori swordlord's saving slash has a 50% chance of reducing a {g|Encyclopedia:Critical}critical hit{/g} to a normal hit.

features.name: Confounding Duelist
features.desc: At 10th level, the {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} from Aldori swordlord's shatter confidence increases to -2. The target also loses all insight and competence {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} to these {g|Encyclopedia:Check}checks{/g}.
